name: Skater 3D Rampage Simulator
description:
Skater 3D Rampage Simulator is the game to play for all skateboard lovers out there. Skateboarders only please. Come and explore the huge maps with skate ramps and jumps. Control the boarder as he makes his way through the street and smashes his way to victory. When you play Skater 3D Simulator, you will find yourself skating your way in the city and competing against other skateboarders. Have fun smashing all obstacles in your way. Go for the highscore every time you play. Do you think you are up for the challenge? Download and get on your board now!
Features:
- Control the 3D Skater.
- Skate down the street and match up with other skaters
- Real skating moves and tricks.
- Excellent 3d graphics with snow and rain effects.
- Awesome music and sound effects.
